titleStmt.title: Martin's eccho: or A remonstrance, from His Holinesse reverend young Martin Mar-Priest, responsorie to the late sacred synoddicall decretall, in all humility presented to the reverend, pious, and grave consideration of the right reverend father in God, the vniversall bishop of our soules, his superlative holinesse Sir Symon Synod.
titleStmt.author: Overton, Richard, fl. 1646.
Robinson, Henry, 1605?-1664?,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Overton, who used the pseudonym Martin Mar-Priest.
William Prynne, in his "Fresh discovery" (Wing P3963), attributes this to Henry Robinson--McAlpin Catalogue, Union Theological Seminary.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
